snippet: A retiree said he had been fired from a job as a greeter at a store in northern Michigan after rushing to the parking lot last month to put out a vehicle fire.
abstract: Retiree David Bowers says he was fired from his job as a greeter at a Meijer store in northern Michigan after rushing to the parking lot to put out a vehicle fire.
lead_paragraph: A retiree said he had been fired from a job as a greeter at a store in northern Michigan after rushing to the parking lot last month to put out a vehicle fire.

headline.main: Michigan: Worker Fired After Helping Put Out Fire
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Worker Fired After Helping Put Out Fire
